list1: Elected Head Boy in Primary 6 (equivalent to 5th Grade).
list2: Represented my school at the Annual Student Leadership Initiative Summit (SMI), winning first place in a mini-competition among 100+ schools.
list3: Had one of the top results on the Common Entrance Examination, the final elementary school exam.

list1: Was selected to be a school prefect in my freshman year of high school (a position that was only open to Juniors and Seniors
list2: Spearheaded a movement to raise funds (up to ₦100,000) from volunteers and notable school alumni for a charity donation to a local orphanage home near my school

header: Dived in to the world of coding!
list1: Learned the syntax of Python for the first time

list3: Built a TicTacToe game with Python
